snippet: Boston has never held a mayoral election with such a racially and ethnically mixed roster of candidates. Nor has its population ever been so diverse.
abstract: Boston's current crop of mayoral candidates is by far the most racially and ethnically mixed in its history, reflecting fact that Boston itself has grown far more diverse; field of a dozen candidates includes five blacks, one Latino and one woman.
lead_paragraph: Boston has never held a mayoral election with such a racially and ethnically mixed roster of candidates. Nor has its population ever been so diverse.

headline.main: In a More Diverse City, a More Diverse Slate of Mayoral Candidates
headline.print_headline: In a More Diverse City, a More Diverse Slate of Mayoral Candidates
